name: Jace, the Mind Sculptor
text: Jace, the Mind Sculptor enters the battlefield with 3 loyalty counters.

loyaltyAbilities.name: Brainstorm
loyaltyAbilities.description: +0: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. Draw a card.

loyaltyAbilities.name: Unsummon
loyaltyAbilities.description: -1: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

loyaltyAbilities.name: Fateseal
loyaltyAbilities.description: -12: Exile all cards from target player's library, then that player shuffles their hand into their library.
